title: R.I.P., Super Teemo...
body:
After this last patch, Teemo no longer flies when he boosts. 
They didn't bother to mention that in the patch notes.

It was my reason for wanting the skin.

replies.body:
This is a known issue, and we're working on  a fix! 

Thanks for the report!
Can you also fix the global Teemo taunt while you're at it?

> [{quoted}](name=BetaDude40,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E7UNfhlu,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-02-16T20:45:03.857+0000)
>
> Can you also fix the global Teemo taunt while you're at it?

What global Teemo taunt? I play him like crazy and i'm not sure what this is.

It's a joke. Because most people have a burning hatred for Teemo and desperately want to kill him, they often focus him instead of an actual threat (not saying Teemo can't be a threat himself). When they focus him, he leads them into his team or the glorious Mushroom Patch, and they blame the "global Teemo taunt".

Here's an example:
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8Kn9atxjCw](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8Kn9atxjCw)
We can always count on KateyKhaos!

take that satan!
boom, right in the animation.

So many skins seem to be crapping out lately.
First SG Udyr loses his unique taunts/jokes and gets stuck with Pheonix sound effects, apparently PF Ezreal lost a few of his lines, Rumble's legendary lost his unique drill change in overheat, and now this!

They really need to fix their visual bugs...

In regards to PFE, his lines were never lost, per se. They were set to play a percentage of the time, so if they didn't play, it sounded lost. We've since changed that, so the audio plays 100% of the time. This change should be noticeable next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E7UNfhlu,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-02-16T18:59:05.522+0000)
>
> In regards to PFE, his lines were never lost, per se. They were set to play a percentage of the time, so if they didn't play, it sounded lost. We've since changed that, so the audio plays 100% of the time. This change should be noticeable next patch.

Sir, what does "PFE" mean? You made me curious.
pulsefire ezreal, and thats a ma'am, not a sir
This, too. :P
Pulsefire Ezreal.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E7UNfhlu,comment-id=0007000000010001,timestamp=2015-02-16T20:04:08.277+0000)
>
> Pulsefire Ezreal.

Thank you sir. You're the best Rioter I've ever met. I don't feel alone when you're around because when you're around, I know that I'm not the only girl there. Have a good ~~night~~ afternoon.

Edit: It may not be night in the USA. Sorry.

"Sir" "girl"

wat
Not from USA so maybe not sure of our honorifics
Yeah , fine, but he had someone that corrected him and he stills makes that mistake.

> [{quoted}](name=exiledFromBadmen,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E7UNfhlu,comment-id=000700000001,timestamp=2015-02-16T19:25:40.959+0000)
>
> Sir, what does "PFE" mean? You made me curious.

Pulse fire extralegal. Also not sir
*cough* Sion bugs *cough*
Veigar laugh after ult kill went missing too.
WHAT?  Bullshit.  I want a refund then. This better be fixed, for I'm seriously going to Riot at Rito HQ.  Say it's just a bug Rito!
its just a bugrito
It's time you move onto Monarch KogMaw instead.
I GUESS it's a bug? He seems to do a lil' hop like maybe the first frame of flying, but then craps out into a regular walking animation. In any case, it kills the primary attraction to this skin.
Rest is pieces Satan :S :D :# :P!!!
At last! One less ~~SATAN!~~ teemo to worry about
LOLZ no no it will never end......dont let it fool you.
Saw another thread like this so it must be true, lets bump this up! :D
This is a hotfix level issue guys!
Riot seems to like removing a lot of easter eggs lately...
